nodes.text: Darren Johnson has worked on many Star Wars games between the years 1994 to 2001, his first being Star Wars: X-Wing and last being Star Wars: Obi-Wan. Other Star Wars games includeStar Wars: Dark Forces, Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Dark Forces II, Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Mysteries of the Sith, Star Wars: DroidWorks, Star Wars: Shadows of the Empire, Star Wars: Rebel Assault II: The Hidden Empire, Star Wars: TIE Fighter and Star Wars: X-Wing vs. TIE Fighter

Darren has also worked on other titles from LucasArts, such as Afterlife, Outlaws, Indiana Jones and His Desktop Adventures, Indiana Jones and the Infernal Machine, The Curse of Monkey Island, Grim Fandango and Full Throttle.
